name: Sniper Elite V2 - The Neudorf Outpost Pack
detailed_description:
This DLC is for the original Sniper Elite V2 (2012). And is included in Sniper Elite V2 Remastered - launching 14th May 2019

A brand new mission. Two new weapons.

A gigantic fuel dump feeds the Nazi war machine as it ploughs through Europe. Head to the Harz Mountains, destroy this crucial outpost and cripple the Axis powers for good.

• New Campaign Mission: Use your wits to carry out the demolition of a heavily defended German fuel dump in the Harz Mountains.

• New Expansive Environment: Plan and execute your approach carefully in this large, open level with multiple routes and tactical choices.

• New Weapons: The M1 Carbine sniper rifle - 15 rounds in a clip with a higher rate of fire, and the Webley Mk. VI revolver - accurate and devastating at both close and medium range.

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista (Service Pack 2) or Windows® 7 or Windows® 8. Windows® XP is NOT supported.
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU with SSE3 (Intel® Pentium® D 3GHz / AMD Athlon™ 64 X2 4200) or better
  • Memory: 2GB system memory
  • Hard Disk Space: 10GB of free drive space
  • Video Card: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible graphics card with 256 MB of memory (NVIDIA® GeForce® 8800 series / ATI Radeon™ HD 3870) or better
  • Sound: Microsoft® DirectX® 10.0 compatible sound card or better
  • DirectX®: Microsoft® DirectX® 11.0
